title: Aardman classics
creator_credit: Aardman Animations, Nick Park, Peter Lord, Steve Box and David Sproxton
brief_description: Compilation of early Aardman short works, ranging from 1978-1999. Aardman, the animation studio specialising in claymation, are renowned for their humour, especially in relation to the portrayal of animals. Highlights here include “Pib and Pog” and “My baby just cares for me”.
creator_credit_for_label: Aardman Animations, Nick Park, Peter Lord, Steve Box and David Sproxton
description: Compilation of early Aardman short works, ranging from 1978-1999. Aardman, the animation studio specialising in claymation, are renowned for their humour, especially in relation to the portrayal of animals. Highlights here include “Pib and Pog” and “My baby just cares for me”.
description_for_label: Compilation of early Aardman short works, ranging from 1978-1999. Aardman, the animation studio specialising in claymation, are renowned for their humour, especially in relation to the portrayal of animals. Highlights here include “Pib and Pog” and “My baby just cares for me”.
